articles.author: David  Schechter
articles.title: How Washington's crossing of the Delaware presaged a changing world - CBS News
articles.description: On the evening of Christmas 1776, Gen. George Washington surprised the King's forces by leading the Continental Army in a surprise crossing of a near-frozen Delaware River - a watershed military maneuver that dramatized a changing America, and a changing clim…
articles.content: Spend some time staring at the famous painting "Washington Crossing the Delaware," and you can't miss the ice. It's everywhere. Cold weather became part of Washington's military strategy, says Alex R… [+4296 chars]
